value:
Ah, my heart... *sigh* As the younger
sister of King Eldigan, I must do my
best to avoid any disgraceful actions.

I can still recall the footwork to one
of my favorite Nordion songs. Would
you like to learn the steps with me?

Do not be too hard on yourself.
I have also stepped on my partner's
feet while learning to waltz.

Hold on a moment! Your footwear is
not suitable for the ball. One would
advise wearing much cleaner soles.

As you can see, I adore dancing.
Why, I could dance all day and night!
Hehe, I must sound so childish...

Good day. I am Lachesis, princess of
Nordion. Here is a formal invitation to
the ball from $Nf.

So delightful, just like a dream...
If only one could continue dancing
like this forever!

No one is as wise and dashing as
Eldigan, but if you would like to dance
with me, try emulating his behavior.

No... My favorite shoes that Eldigan
gave to me, they...

Thank you. One can enjoy
dancing even more now.

I am Lachesis, sister to Lord Eldigan.
Since the ball will begin soon, would
you mind escorting me?

You think me a wallflower because I
turned down a single dance? It is
quite rude to be so presumptuous.$k$pI fancy balls, but if my partner does
not have equal stature to that of my
brother, it simply would not work out.$k$pWhen I was younger, I used to be
incredibly passionate about dancing.
But that foolish child is gone now.$k$pI don't expect you to understand...
But, you have to admit that your
comments to me were hypocritical.$k$pWhy don't you summon up some
courage and ask someone to dance
with you, $Nu?$k$pThat way you can have a beautiful
dream. This ephemeral chance will
vanish once the last song plays.
てやっ
これで…
ああっ
Why...?
Grant me strength...
Let us dance.
What a treat.
Try to keep up.
The tune grows faint...
sigh...
You must be careful.
Do not risk your life.
My brother Eldigan and I used to spend hours dancing together, for practice. I quite enjoyed those days...
One cannot help but shine in such a splendid outfit.
The princess of Nordion often turns heads with her refined style of dance.
With whom will Eldie be dancing, I wonder.
You strike me as a competent dancer. Care to take my hand for the next song?
Naturally.
You lead.
Shall we?
